synopsis.text: Now a skilled ninja, Fujimaru embarks on a quest to reunite with his missing mother and uncover the secrets of an ancient tome filled with forbidden martial arts techniques. Rescued as a child by a ninja named Sasuke after being kidnapped by an eagle, Fujimaru has honed his ninjutsu abilities over the years. In a tumultuous era, Fujimaru and a young girl named Midori cross paths with rival ninja masters, each seeking control over a mysterious material that holds the key to world domination. Fujimaru's journey is fraught with battles against evil forces and encounters with his arch nemesis, all while he delves deeper into the world of classic ninja techniques such as elemental manipulation, illusionary clones, and underwater breathing through a reed. Though an older series, it remains a captivating tale of adventure, growth, and the search for family.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
